required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of an Oral Supplement Containing Omega-3 and Omega-6 on Dry Eye Symptoms
clinical_study.official_title: The Use of a Novel Oral Supplement Containing Omega-3 and Omega-6 Fatty Acids on Dry Eye Symptoms (TURMERIC)

brief_summary.textblock: This study will investigate the effectiveness of two oral supplements on the ocular signs and symptoms in symptomatic dry eye patients. Eligible participants will be given one of two oral supplements to take once a day for up to three months.

primary_outcome.description: The OSDI is assessed on a scale of 0 and 100. A higher composite score indicates more severe dryness.
The OSDI is assessed on a scale of 0 and 100. A higher composite score indicates more severe dryness.
The OSDI is assessed on a scale of 0 and 100. A higher composite score indicates more severe dryness.

primary_outcome.measure: Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: The Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) questionnaire is a dry eye questionnaire that asks participants to describe the frequency and severity of their dry eye symptoms using a visual analogue scale.

primary_outcome.measure: Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: The Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) questionnaire is a dry eye questionnaire that asks participants to describe the frequency and severity of their dry eye symptoms using a visual analogue scale.

primary_outcome.measure: Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: The Symptom Assessment in Dry Eye (SANDE) questionnaire is a dry eye questionnaire that asks participants to describe the frequency and severity of their dry eye symptoms using a visual analogue scale.

The small strip of paper is removed from the Schirmer test package, folded at one end, and is inserted into the outer corner of the participant's eyes. The participant is asked to close their eyes and wait for 5 minutes. After 5 minutes, the paper is removed and the length of which the paper strip is wetted is recorded in mm.

The participant is asked to close their eyes and wait for 5 minutes. After 5 minutes, the paper is removed and the length of which the paper strip is wetted is recorded in mm.

Time taken for tear film breakup as measured objectively in seconds.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Bulbar hyperemia after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: The redness of the bulbar conjunctiva of both eyes will be assessed in all four quadrants using the Efron scale (0-4, in 0.1 steps).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Limbal hyperemia after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: The redness of the limbal conjunctiva of both eyes will be assessed in all four quadrants using the Efron scale (0-4, in 0.1 steps).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Tear meniscus height after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of tear meniscus height in mm.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Meiboscore (Arita's scale) after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Graded on 0-3 scale. Grade 0: no dropout, Grade 1: < 1/3 total area dropout, Grade 2: 1/3 to 2/3 total area dropout, Grade 3: > 2/3 total area dropout

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Visual acuity after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: High contrast logMAR VA with computerized charts in high illumination

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Tear osmolarity after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Measure of the osmolarity of collected tears.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Omega-3 index after 3 months
secondary_outcome.description: Amount of EPA and DHA in erythrocytes

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive an oral supplement containing fish oil, evening primrose oil and borage oil.
Subjects will receive an oral supplement containing coconut oil and light olive oil.

intervention.intervention_name: Oral supplement containing omega-3 and omega-6
intervention.description: An oral supplement containing omega-3 and omega-6

intervention.intervention_name: Oral supplement containing coconut and olive oil
intervention.description: An oral supplement containing coconut oil and olive oil
